document_data.caption: A map showing Hack Street in south Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Hack Street
document_data.starts: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Hack Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Hack Street was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]] in the south section of the city. The road was located in the northwest section of the Harbor District, running between the wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] and the docks.
document_data.Notable Locations: A warehouse used by the [[Zhentarim]] was located on Hack Street.
